articles.title: It's official: No. 11 BYU will play No. 5 Texas Tech for Big 12 title — after home finale with UCF - KSL.com
articles.description: The Cougars didn't have to wait until after Saturday's 11 a.m. kickoff in Provo to clinch their first Big 12 championship game berth: Arizona did that for them Friday night.

articles.title: No. 16 Texas spoils No. 3 Texas A&M's perfect season 27-17, knocks Aggies out of SEC title game - AP News
articles.description: Arch Manning threw a touchdown pass and ran for the clinching score late in the fourth quarter and No. 16 Texas beat No. 3 Texas A&M 27-17 on Friday night to spoil the Aggies’ undefeated season and knock them out of the Southeastern Conference championship ga…

articles.title: Nick Sirianni says he won’t be changing the offensive playcaller - NBC Sports
articles.description: In Philly, it's beginning to look a lot like 2023.

articles.title: The Big 12’s commissioner just lobbied for BYU over Notre Dame in the CFP. Here’s what he said - Deseret News
articles.description: The Big 12 Conference commissioner said BYU should get into the College Football Playoff over Notre Dame.

articles.title: Source: Lane Kiffin is lining up LSU staff - NBC Sports
articles.description: Mississippi coach Lane Kiffin has said he'll make his decision on whether to stay put on Saturday.

articles.title: Game Recap: Bears best Eagles on Black Friday, improve to 9-3 - Chicago Bears
articles.description: The Bears rushed for 281 yards and two touchdowns and their defense generated two takeaways and permitted just two TDs in a 24-15 win over the Eagles Friday at Lincoln Financial Field.

articles.title: Pitt Beats Ohio State at the Buzzer for Second Straight Season, 67-66 | Eleven Warriors - Eleven Warriors
articles.description: Ohio State loses to Pitt in buzzer-beater fashion for the second straight year. A logo shot by Damarco Minor sealed the Buckeyes' fate, 67-66.

articles.description: Brock Purdy's worst nightmare is set to be in attendance for 49ers-Browns as the quarterback performs poorly in inclement weather.
